definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Grab your tissues and find out in this touching weeper.
sentences.chinese: 掏出紙巾吧，在這部動人的催淚小說中找到答案。

sentences.english: Will you please give me another paper napkin (serviette/tissue), too?
sentences.chinese: 也請再給我一條紙巾好嗎？

sentences.english: First, shake out as much water as you can and dry it off with a paper towel.
sentences.chinese: 首先你要使勁的甩幹它，然後用紙巾儘量吸乾。

sentences.english: Princess first took over the boy's tissue, is the onion guy.
sentences.chinese: 健忘公主第一次接過男生滴紙巾，就是蔥頭的。

sentences.english: Step 3: Fold your sweaters in acid-free tissue paper, which you can find online or in good stationery stores.
sentences.chinese: 摺疊毛衣放入無酸性紙巾中，可在網上或新據點找到。

sentences.english: I ask as I splutter into a tissue.
sentences.chinese: 我一邊拿紙巾擤鼻涕一邊問他。

sentences.english: She gave us a box of tissues.
John:Do you have any tissue, Eveline?
Circulate a monthly release of toilet paper and collection of certificate photos.
sentences.chinese: 協助行政助理每月發放一次紙巾，收集辦證相片。

sentences.english: The company's pulp manufacturing process, such as the promotion of tissue paper products.
sentences.chinese: 公司的紙漿製造工藝促進了紙巾等紙製品的發展。

sentences.english: Drain on paper towels and dust with confectioner's sugar.
sentences.chinese: 之後用紙巾將油吸乾，並將食用糖粉撒在上面。

sentences.english: Dry hands with an air dryer, disposable paper towel or personal towel.
sentences.chinese: 用吹風機，一次性紙巾或者個人毛巾把手吹乾。

sentences.english: If Mr. Pliner's shoes do get wet, he immediately tries to dry them with paper towels.
sentences.chinese: 如果靴子弄溼了，普利鈉會馬上用紙巾把靴子擦乾。

sentences.english: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Refill Pack, 25 Count.
sentences.chinese: 露得清卸妝潔面紙巾，補充包，25計數。

sentences.english: We have printed more than 50 000 tissue so many people are educated.
sentences.chinese: 我們共印了5萬多個紙巾，讓許多人受到教育。

sentences.english: Could you give me some more napkins, some sweet-and-sour sauce and pepper?
sentences.chinese: 請多給我幾張紙巾和一些甜酸醬及胡椒。

definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
